ygData.subject: Configure MostFavoredSet via Crawler-Beans.cmxl
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am running heritrix3.3 SNAPSHOT. I want to use heritrix MostFavoredRobotsPolicy but I don t know how to setup the alternate User-Agent-List in
